CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(RecordTypeId = "0122A000001QFOC", Submitted__c = TRUE, PL_Approved__c = FALSE, MD_Approved__c = FALSE), "Pending PL Approval", IF(AND(RecordTypeId = "0122A000001QFOC", Submitted__c = TRUE, PL_Approved__c = TRUE, MD_Approved__c = FALSE), "Pending MD Approval", IF(AND(RecordTypeId = "0122A000001QFOC", Submitted__c = TRUE, PL_Approved__c = TRUE, MD_Approved__c = TRUE), "Approved",
IF(AND(RecordTypeId = "0122A000001QFOH", Submitted__c = TRUE, PL_Approved__c = FALSE, MD_Approved__c = FALSE), "Pending Manager Approval", IF(AND(RecordTypeId = "0122A000001QFOH", Submitted__c = TRUE, PL_Approved__c = TRUE, MD_Approved__c = FALSE), "Pending Function Lead Approval", IF(AND(RecordTypeId = "0122A000001QFOH", Submitted__c = TRUE, PL_Approved__c = TRUE, MD_Approved__c = TRUE), "Approved",
"Draft"))))))
CustomField.label: Status
